# ITrpc

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ITrpc is to provide some common IT utility functions.

## Installation

You can install it from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("pfc5098/ITrpc")
```
